text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue where concept is-a _SecurityObservationValue
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-SecurityClassificationObservationValue

name: SecurityObservationValue
title: SecurityObservationValue
description: Observation values used to indicate security observation metadata.
